title: Entity Types Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for entity type classification. Phase 0 placeholder.

values.label: Person
values.description: Individual human or humanoid character, including historical and fictional persons.

values.label: Place
values.description: Geographic location including planets, cities, buildings, and natural features.

values.label: Organization
values.description: Group, company, government, faction, or other collective entity.

values.label: Event
values.description: Historical event, battle, ceremony, or significant occurrence.

values.label: Concept
values.description: Abstract idea, force, technology, or theoretical construct.

values.label: Artifact
values.description: Physical object, weapon, tool, or created item of significance.

values.label: Species
values.description: Biological species, race, or type of creature.

values.label: Other
values.description: Entity that does not fit other categories. Use sparingly.

notes: This vocabulary is a placeholder for Phase 0 scaffolding. Values may be refined based on domain requirements.
